typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(ProductCategoryID >= 10 && ProductCategoryID <=20,
	ProductCategoryID >= 30 && ProductCategoryID <=50,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(pcat20, Pcat50, others)
ConditionalSplit1@pcat20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Pcat50 sink(input(
		BookId as string,
		Name as string,
		Author as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@others sink(input(
		BookId as string,
		Name as string,
		Author as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink3
